Heading: Number of victims
Value:
3 (Although it is speculated that he might’ve killed a man sometime before these 3 victims.  This information is based on a diary he supposedly had that Gretchen stole from him. 
It was never proven for sure if the diary even existed.)

Heading: Location
Value: It is unclear where he was born, but he was adopted the

Heading: Family event
Value: His parents tell him he is adopted.  He locates his birth mother and the meeting does not go the way he wanted it to.

Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Just minor problems such as stealing gym clothes and tools

Heading: Physically attractive?
Value: No, but he had no problem getting girls.  He used make-up to darken his skin, dyed his hair, wore chapstick to make his lips white, and he darkened in a mole to make it bigger. He also stuffed rags and cans in his boots to make himself taller.

Heading: Physical defect?
Value: No, but he often lied and told girls he was crippled in order to get them to feel sorry for him.

Heading: Head injury?
Value: Yes-Hit in head by lead pipe.

Heading: Physically abused?
Value: He said his father beat him but there was no evidence of this.

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Possibly by his bad encounter with his birth mother.

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: 18+ is when the Playboys were mentioned and his supposed “sex club” was spoke about, although his first experience was probably much earlier.

Heading: Age when first had intercourse
Value: It is unclear but Mary French lived with him and slept in the same bed with him when he was 21.

Heading: Father abused drugs/alcohol
Value: No (do not know about his biological father)

Heading: Mother abused drugs/alcohol
Value: No (do not know about his biological mother)

Heading: Highest degree
Value: He dropped out his senior year after being suspended for stealing tools from the machine shop.

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Below average, although his teachers gave the impression that his grades were due to lack of interest, as opposed to lack of intelligence. He said, “I quit out of boredom.”

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: He started an upholstery business that only lasted about a

Heading: Marital status
Value: Married for about 8 months to 15 year old Diane Lynch.

Heading: Number of children
Value: Mary French was said to have given birth to a stillborn child belonging to Smitty when she was briefly living in Chicago.

Heading: Living with
Value: Mostly by himself, although friends lived with him off and on, as well as the short period he was married.

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value:
Charles and friends went to jail for a night for “creating unlawful diversion” by driving around town with 
someone’s arm hanging out the window covered in ketchup

Heading: Spend time in jail?
Value: Yes, one night for the event listed above and a couple of other nights in California for being a murder suspect.

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Type of victim
Value: Young females (2 sisters of prominent heart surgeon, and one high school dropout)

Heading: Method of killing
Value: 1st murder- Beat victim with rocks; 2nd & 3rd murders- It is speculated that he strangled them with a cord that went to his guitar but it was never proven.

Heading: Name of partner
Value: 1st Killing: Mary French and John Saunders

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: Drove out to desert in Tucson to commit 1st murder; Killed victims at his home in 2nd and 3rd.

Heading: Location of first contact
Value: He met Alleen at the local hangouts, he saw Gretchen at the swimming pool, then went to her house pretending to be a pots and pans salesman.

Heading: Location of killing
Value: 1st: In the desert on the outskirts of Tucson; 2nd/3rd: In his home.

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Rape?
Value: Does not say, but was insinuated.

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Moved, no attempt to hide
Value: Yes (2nd and 3rd Victims), and partially buried, then went back and buried more thoroughly later.

Heading: Sentence
Value: Death for the murders of the Fritz sisters, 50 years for Alleen Rowe.

Heading: Name and state of prison
Value: Arisona State Prison near Florence, AZ

Heading: Killer killed in prison?
Value: Yes (10 day after wounds suffered by attack that happened in prison)
